name: Matt's Crappy Game
description:
Take control of a little black dot and destroy all the little red and green enemies.

This is a small game I made by following Tom Francis' wonderful "How to Make a Game With no Experience" tutorial video.

If you're interested in learning how to use Game Maker Studio, go watch his videos: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLUtKzyIe0aB...

Note: The game is best played with an actual mouse, rather than a trackpad.
